variables.name: Income
variables.description: Total taxable income for tax calculation.

variables.name: Bracket_1
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 1: 2.22% on the portion of income up to $10,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_2
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 2: 2.96% on the portion of income over $10,000 up to $25,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_3
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 3: 3.33% on the portion of income over $25,000 up to $40,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_4
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 4: 4.44% on the portion of income over $40,000 up to $60,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_5
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 5: 4.82% on the portion of income over $60,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: FinalTaxes
variables.description: Sum of Bracket_1 through Bracket_5 in numerical order. Includes zeros from brackets that do not apply. Calculation must always add all five brackets explicitly.

rules.translation: FinalTaxes is greater or equal to 0
